data.title: Nightlife in Ibiza: 17 Best Clubs in Ibiza
data.meta_description: Nightlife in Ibiza: 17 Best Clubs in Ibiza
data.text:

The Spanish island of Ibiza is globally-known for its wild nightlife scene. It is a reputed clubbing destination that welcomes people from all across the world. Remarkably, the nightlife in Ibiza is an eccentric mix of European youth clubs and the traditional night festivities of Spain. The island features some of the most renowned clubs that are among the finest in Europe and the entire world.

The nightlife in Ibiza is concentrated in two major areas, namely Ibiza Town & the Island’s capital on the eastern end and Sant Antoni on the Western shore. There is a small strip in Ibiza known as the West end strip situated in the San Antonio area that embraces bars from top to bottom, and it just takes around 8-10 mins to stride from the top to the bottom. However, the strip is packed with all varied kinds of bars, so everyone will surely find something as per their preferences. There are clubs in the surrounding area & Ibiza Town, but some are scattered around the island. If you want to get a few drinks before proceeding towards super-clubs for a wilder & upscale night out, the strip is the place to start.

Here is a list of the finest nightclubs & bars in Ibiza that are all set to welcome you for a super-exciting & unforgettable nightlife in Ibiza.

1. Amnesia Ibiza

Amnesia is a globally-renowned club, located near the San Rafael village on the highway between Ibiza Town and Sant Antoni de Portmany. Being home to music lovers, Amnesia is among the largest clubs in Europe. It welcomes plenty of party people every season and has become the confluence for clubbers from all over the planet. This club has received the award of Best Global Club in IDMA Awards in Miami multiple times. Some infamous personalities who have partied here include Leonardo di Caprio, Shakira, Naomi Campbell, Cristiano Ronaldo, and Lionel Messi.

Location: Ctra. Ibiza a San Antonio, Km 5, 07816 Ibiza, Balearic Islands

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 11:00 PM - 6:00 AM

2. Pacha Ibiza

One of the biggest names in the world is Pacha, whose nights will never let you be disappointed. It is the most iconic nightclub in the world, featuring a charming combination of music, glamor, & heritage. Pacha Ibiza nightclub has been the deep-rooted pioneer of this island's dance & cultural movement since 1973. It is popular for its outstanding sound system, stylish décor, & unique atmosphere. It features some of the best DJs on the island and has a capacity of 3,000 people. Notably, Pacha is just a 10-minute walk from Ibiza Town and easily accessible from the Marina.

Location: Av. 8 d'Agost, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM

3. DC10

DC10 is a nightclub set in the Carretera of Salinas on the island. It is one of the long-established clubs in Ibiza and is recognized across the world for its no-holds-barred approach to dance. The club has been the hub of underground music since its establishment in 1999 and operates in an old airplane hangar that is only a short distance to the east of Aeroport d'Eivissa, so you can start your evening from this place. The club encompasses three main spaces - the main room, the garden, and the terrace with a wooden deck. DC10 offers an exhilarating atmosphere, as it is one of the self-indulgent nightclubs for which Ibiza is renowned.

Location: Carretera las salinas, km 1, 07818 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears

Open: Monday: 6:00 PM - 6:00 AM (Tuesday - Sunday: Closed)

4. Ibiza Underground Club

Ibiza Underground Club is a slightly contrasting venue from the other clubs on this island and always offers an intimate vibe. Snuggled on the outskirts of San Rafael, just off the San Antonio - Ibiza highway, Underground is a modest nightspot set in an old-fashioned Ibizan estate and is slightly difficult to find. The club is popular due to its exclusivity and gives you the impression that you are a part of something really special. It features a spacious outside terrace & considerable seating and extends a more laid-back dimension of the nightlife scene in Ibiza.

Location: Crta. San Antonio - Ibiza Km.7 07816 San Rafael, Ibiza

Timings: Tuesday - Saturday: 11:00 PM - 6:00 AM

5. Eden Club

Just a couple of minutes away from the west end, Eden is situated in the San Antonio area of Ibiza. Eden is a huge landmark nightclub that hosts ever-popular international DJs & laser light shows and is a part of the exclusive circuit of the leading clubs in Ibiza. Notably, this professional club features an ultra-modern main room & a second room known as NeXt that embraces independent access and an exclusive & high-powered sound system in Ibiza - the Incubus Gold by Void, a sophisticated piece of sound engineering that is like a dream for any music lover and DJ. Besides, there is a main dance floor, different levels, several bars, and two VIP areas with private parking. Also, the DJ portfolio at Eden includes many popular names in the music industry including Goldfish, Lady Gaga, Markus Schulz, & Sasha among others.

Location: Carrer Salvador Espriu, s/n, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM

6. Privilege Ibiza

Formerly known as the Ku Club, Privilege Ibiza Guinness World record holder for being the largest nightclub in the world. It is adjacent to the San Rafael village, at a distance of less than one km from the Club Amnesia. With the capacity of accommodating 10,000 people at a time, Privilege comes under the category of a Super-club. It boasts huge swimming pools and features sensual dancers & artistic performers, and the party here does not get going till it is dark and the party room is lit. Here, the house and techno rave parties continue till dawn, when the charming view of the town begins to appear from its all-glass walls.

Location: Urbanización San Rafael, s/n, 07816 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Balearic Islands

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM

7. Lola's Club Eivissa

Lola's club is one of the first nightclubs in Ibiza running since 1965. It is nestled in the quaint Old Town in the southeast of the island. The club remains open throughout the year, welcoming party-goers who want to delve into a rustic ambiance with underground electronic music. Though it hosts different DJs playing electronic tunes, it is known as the pioneer of disco music. It sprawls over an indoor room and attractive terrace that features a welcoming crowd that dances till the wee hours, and if you stay there till sunrise, watch the beautiful view from its terrace. It is an LGBTQ-friendly place and is popular among the locals.

Location: Carrer d'Alfons XII, 12, 07800 Ibiza, Illes Balears

Timings: Thursday - Saturday: 11:45 PM - 6:00 AM; Sunday: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM; Monday - Wednesday: Closed.

8. Plastik Ibiza

Featuring luxuriant surroundings, Plastik is one of the high-profile bars in the party town of Ibiza. It is recognized as a modish bar that extends into a mini nightclub. The bar is a meeting point for workers and vacationers alike, with high-quality music and a small club atmosphere by night. It is ideally known for its pre-parties on the island, especially the boat parties. Plastik proudly extends an unparalleled VIP experience with a personalized touch. It offers great house music and is a glam spot to dance that is ideal for those who want to fancy a dance but do not want to stick to a Super-club.

Location: Carrer des Caló, 47, 07829 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 11:00 PM - 5:00 AM

9. Club Chinois Ibiza

Snuggled in the Ibiza Gran Hotel, Club Chinois is one of the finest clubs delivering leading-edge music and riveting entertainment in the center of Ibiza marina. Being the sister venue of the famous Park Chinois in London, this club exhibits the ethnic diversity of international DJs and pleasure-seekers from different regions. This 3000 sqm venue is designed by Parisian Design Studio, Laleh Assefi, and features bold yet tasteful interiors, including golden columns, lavish textiles, and intricate wall art. It offers high-class modern entertainment on the sunny shores with traditional hospitality.

Location: Passeig Joan Carles I, 17, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears, Spain

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:30 AM

10. Hï Ibiza

Hï Ibiza is a high-energy venue renowned as the most technologically-advanced club on the planet with ultramodern electronic music. Remarkably, it has been titled as World’s No.1 Club in 2022 as it has set a new benchmark for numerous global party-goers by constant innovation and development. The nightclub that formerly operated under the name Space was re-established as Hï Ibiza in the summer of 2017. It has an ideal combination of high-class staff, innovative design, & groundbreaking sound technology, and each detail of this club contributes to the finest clubbing experience. It is infamous for the best underground house and techno nights in Ibiza with celebrity DJs.

Location: Platja d'en Bossa, 07817, Balearic Islands

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM

11. Swag Ibiza Club

Swag Ibiza Club is predominantly an urban music dance club with a diversified vibe that charms multi-genre guests. With a capacity of 1000 guests, Swag is nestled in Hotel Garbi Ibiza & Spa in the center of Playa d’en Bossa. It features a chic DJ booth that can host two DJs at once, three different VIP areas, and a splendid lighting setup. The DJ guests at Swag are A-list artists with global recognition, praised for their work in the urban music industry, who offer a blend of different kinds of urban music with the best Latin, Hip Hop, Trap, & Reggaeton beats.

Location: Carrer de la Murtra, 5, 07817 Sant Josep de sa Talaia, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM

12. The Rock Bar Ibiza

The Original Rock Bar Ibiza is among the most popular bars along the strip in the port of Ibiza. It is a stylish bar with fantastic cocktails, amazing ambiance, and good tunes. Rock Bar has a wide drinks menu to cater to all tastes and budgets, including vodkas, gins, whiskeys, & rums. They use high-quality spirits and fresh fruits to make refreshing cocktails. Being conveniently located at the marina, Rock Bar is among the favorite bars in Ibiza, offering a fun-filled environment & is ideal to spark off the night with a few cocktails and delicious tapas.

Location: Carrer de Cipriano Garijo, 14, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 6:00 PM - 4:00 AM

13. Tirapallà

Tirapallà is a charming rooftop bar with a reposeful atmosphere and cocktails. It features an outdoor terrace with splendid views of the old Dalt Vila in Ibiza and offers different kinds of cocktails, cold tapas, & amazing atmosphere. With beyond 20 years of experience, this rooftop is a gathering place for Ibizans and travelers who came to explore the mystical alleys of the historic heart of Ibiza. Here, you can enjoy invigorating cocktails with romantic views of the Ibiza old town and an appealing indie soundtrack in the backdrop.

Location: Carrer d'Alfons XII, 10, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears

Timings: Tuesday - Sunday: 7:00 PM - 4:00 AM, Monday: Closed

14. EI Swing

EI Swing is a disco club established in Ibiza in 2013, featuring a top-notch design and sophisticated sound system. It greets numerous music lovers from all across the globe that are desirous of enjoying the Caribbean rhythms in the Ibizan style. Also, it serves refreshing cocktails in a decent ambiance and has been awarded on various occasions. This LGBTQ+ friendly disco plays one of the best Latin music on the island, where one can find the finest entertainment & people with good vibes. The talented DJ Wilson Zapata at EI Swing is a global musical benchmark on the island of Ibiza every year.

Location: Carrer del Bisbe Abad y Lasierra, 38, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears

Timings: Wednesday - Sunday: 12:00 AM - 6:00 AM (Monday-Tuesday: Closed)

15. Paradise Lost

Tucked away in a small alleyway on Carrer del Passadis in Ibiza town, Paradise Lost is a rum and cocktail bar that acclaims both the good and the bad in all of us. Its name is inspired by Milton's epic poem on temptation in Eden's Garden. It offers a retreat from the world amidst a relaxing ambiance with an ideal fusion of drinks & friendly people. The interior flaunts luxurious leather Chesterfield sofas, neon graffiti walls, drip-inked paintings, and a comfortable cobbled terrace. You can enjoy a unique drinking experience with an extensive Balearic playlist here.

Location: Carrer del Passadis, 14, 07800, Ibiza town, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 8:00 PM - 3:00 AM

16. Bamboo Bar Ibiza

Nestled on the waterfront, past the sunset strip towards Cala Gracio, the Bamboo bar is within a walkable distance of San Antonio. It is one of the favorite bars in Ibiza, where visitors receive a pleasant reception from the owners. The bar offers a substantial range of beers from around the globe and a splendid menu of cocktails. It enjoys an awesome location right on the promenade, offering admirable sunset views. Light snacks, including sandwiches and crisps, are available to accompany your drinks. At night this bar becomes an imposing people-watching spot and remains open all along the front.

Location: Carrer Ponent, 10, 07820 Sant Antoni de Portmany, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 5:00 PM - 3:00 AM

17. Number 5 Ibiza

Number 5 Ibiza is one of the coolest bars in the town, set at the port of Ibiza. It is an ideal spot to start your evening and unwind in style. The bar attracts a friendly crowd, and people mainly visit it for its lovely cocktail menu and chilled ambiance. It serves a selection of classic as well as quirky cocktails, and its knowledgeable bartenders will be delighted to prepare a drink that uplifts your mood. With a modern interior and DJs playing a mix of chill and deep house, Number 5 is probably one of the most comfortable bars in town.

Location: Carrer de Cipriano Garijo, 5, 07800 Eivissa, Illes Balears

Timings: Monday - Sunday: 10:00 AM - 4:00 AM

How To Dress for Nightlife in Ibiza

Visitors should have a casual getup for their night out in Ibiza. Notably, some more upscale nightclubs like Pacha, Ushuaïa, Club Chinois, and Hï Ibiza prohibit entering with flip-flops, beachwear, and basketball or football T-shirts. Moreover, some of them also require men to be in long trousers. You are advised to kindly read the venue's policy or terms regarding appropriate dress codes and stick to them. Besides, the VIP lounges also usually disallow entry with flip-flops, swimwear & sportswear, and the men in shorts & tank tops. Also, guests are strictly prohibited from entering the clubs with any backpack or carrying case for security reasons. However, belts and handbags are considered an exception.

Ibiza is celebrated as the world's party capital for a reason, thanks to its clubs. The island enchants numerous clubbers each year to have a good time as it is the ideal destination to party, discover new music, and socialize with people. Besides its pristine white beaches and azure waters all around, the nightclubs in Ibiza will undoubtedly be the best part of your vacation. With the biggest DJs across the globe playing here, Ibiza awaits you to have a memorable clubbing experience.

This post was published by Kanika Sharma
